products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink perfect fit roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This, moisutre-resistant perfect fit roller blind with drill-free fit and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your upvc window or door.

products.title: Splash Latte Brown Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash latte brown perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this light brown perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-white Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A stylish dark blue/navy shade, splash indigo blue is a stylish, contemporary colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and conservatories as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any upvc window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly under the window beading, which means no drilling.
